name: Flower Defender
description:
must protecc da flowerr

merge with purple slime left by enemies, collect weapons and protecc

Game made for ScoreSpace Jam #14, Theme: Merging

collecting/using weapons: A,S,D,F

Gamepad controls:
Moving: Left Stick
collecting/using weapons: Y,B,A,X
